originalText.text: My son has been at Little DayDreamers since February of this year. The leaps and bounds he's made with social, language and developmental skills are amazing! He just loves Kexia, Ydalia and the rest of the team there. Brenda and staff are all very responsive and flexible to our needs. It has been a blessing for my son and our family. I highly recommend!

text.text: My son has been at Little DayDreamers since February of this year. The leaps and bounds he's made with social, language and developmental skills are amazing! He just loves Kexia, Ydalia and the rest of the team there. Brenda and staff are all very responsive and flexible to our needs. It has been a blessing for my son and our family. I highly recommend!

originalText.text:
We toured Little Daydreamers 2 (LDD2) on the day before our son was born. We were so impressed by the warmth and professionalism shown by Brenda, Kexia and their team that we put down our deposit right away. In fact, we often say that choosing LDD2 was our first big decision as parents -- and we could not have been happier with how the experience has turned out.

LDD2 provided a safe, welcoming, healthy and nurturing environment for our son and we fully recommend this daycare to any parent in the area.

Care: Since our son's very first day at LDD2 when he was 5 months old, Brenda, Kexia and the team have felt like an extension of our own family. In particular, we would like to thank Kexia, Site Director and Ydalia for their help and support during our time at LDD2. They are truly gifted caregivers and we feel blessed that they were among the first and most frequent caregivers for our child in his first two years.

Communication: The team at LDD2 provides very clear and frequent communications throughout the day through an app and there's a live camera feed. We always felt up-to-date throughout the day and the staff always gave us a review of the day when we picked up our son. This communication really helped us as new parents -- we always knew if he had a good nap, had eaten well, when his diaper was changed and all the other little details new parents want to hear about.

Organization/Professionalism: As the team director, Brenda was an excellent partner to us as parents. Billing was simple and efficient, and updates about staffing, COVID protocols and other topics were always communicated to us clearly and with plenty of notice. Brenda genuinely strives to run the best daycare center in the area. Our son was at LDD2 through all the various waves of COVID (and subsequent waves of RSV and other viruses as the world reopened!) and Brenda and Kexia's commitment to run a healthy daycare was fantastic and far exceeded what we have heard is the norm   at other daycares.

All to say, we are very grateful to the LDD2 team and recommend them wholeheartedly.

originalText.text: We enrolled our daughter at LDD2 when she was about 13 months old and we are so happy we did. We knew we loved the place from the moment we toured and met Brenda and Kexia. The intake process was seamless and both Brenda and Kexia took their time to get to know us and set up the transition week for our daughter. As new parents, this really made us feel at ease and that we picked the right place for us. Ydalia, Helen, Diana and the rest of the staff at LDD2 are so incredibly kind, warm, thoughtful and caring. They have become an extension of our family. The staff to child ratio is low which means your child will get lots of individualized attention. Our daughter has THRIVED here. She loves her teachers, and her fellow classmates have become her close friends. Honestly, sometimes on days when she is home with us she is actually bored :-). We love that they take the children out every day for a nature walk, and have daily circle and reading time, as well as music and sign language classes! My daughter is even learning Spanish, it's so awesome! The staff still take great covid precautions, they have an app and camera access so you get updates throughout the day, and they are really good at helping you through any and all of life transitions for your little one. I would recommend LDD2 a thousand times over. We absolutely love this place!!!

originalText.text: I can't say enough positive things about LDD2!  We enrolled our son at 6 months old after a negative experience with another big name daycare in the area and feel like we hit the jackpot.  Right off the bat, they were so willing to accommodate our feeding/nap schedule and routine and have been open and flexible to making any adjustments that we requested as he has gotten older.  The staff are amazing- so loving, nurturing and fun!  Our son is excited to go to "school" every day and will reach for the staff with a big smile when they greet us as the door.  The communication has been great via the app, email correspondence with the director s, and brief chats about his day when I pick him up. As a new mom, it was really hard for me to leave my son when I went back to work but the team at LDD2 has done so much to put me as ease.  It is such a gift to know that I am leaving him in such loving and capable hands. We are so grateful to have found them.

originalText.text: We are so happy we found Little Daydreamers! Our son has been going to Little Daydreamers since he was 6 months old and it was an easy adjustment because of all the wonderful people who work there. As new parents we were trying to sort out sleep and feeding schedules and Brenda and her team were accommodating and so helpful. We love how outgoing and happy our son is! He's gone through so many milestones very quickly with the help of Little Daydreamers. We know our little one is in excellent hands there!
